member.name: DWRITE_GLYPH_IMAGE_DATA.uniqueDataId
member.summary: Unique identifier for the glyph data. Clients may use this to cache a parsed/decompressed version and tell whether a repeated call to the same font returns the same data.

member.name: DWRITE_GLYPH_IMAGE_DATA.pixelsPerEm
member.summary: Pixels per em of the returned data. For non-scalable raster data (PNG/TIFF/JPG), this can be larger or smaller than requested from GetGlyphImageData when there isn't an exact match. For scaling intermediate sizes, use: desired pixels per em * font em size / actual pixels per em.
